issue.title: Fix #200882 tvguide.com
issue.body:
Fix https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/200882

`script.wikia.nocookie.net/fandom-ae-assets/identity-service/` is a tracking link among different sites. I have logged in to `fandom.com` site and looks like the site works normally, but I'm not sure completely.

comment.body:
Looks like there's another site: https://www.reddit.com/r/uBlockOrigin/comments/1kox81x/video_and_picture_viewer_blocked_on_gamespotcom/

I'll remove the rule.

issue.title: s.kakaku.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://s.kakaku.com/item/J0000047424/#tab01](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fs.kakaku.com%2Fitem%2FJ0000047424%2F%23tab01) ### Comment > 価格比較/製品情報タブが隠れてしまいます。この問題は、AdGuard 追跡防止フィルタを無効にすると再現しません。 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/slixxadbmo004cgsw0ss4gsgo80wog87fsc00liyog.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/gmtybmud7t448ow8s4wccs8kkgg4k0wj6lnv41fvk0.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.10 System version: | iOS 18.5 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

Security:
uBlock Origin – Badware risks

Language-specific:
AdGuard Japanese

comment.body:
It seems like a bug in the webpage.
This happens when jQuery's load event is fired before the ajax request to `s.kakaku.com/history/ajax/showmenu/` has completed. It can happen without AdGuard.
